channel.title: [317] Norvation-PS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/Untitled-1_zps6859a40f.png[/img]
Welcome to Norvation-PS. We feature a wide variety of Bossing and PVP like no other server you've seen before. Now I know what you're thinking. "Why should I play this server over other servers?". The answer is simple. Because we care about every single player, and their opinions. Before we add a new feature, we try our best to get everyone's feedback before we implement it into the game. Now log in and join the rest of us in the RSPS the community desires!
Forums - http://norvation-ps.com/
[CENTER]Features[/CENTER] [CENTER]-11X Experience rate for new players -Able to choose between old and new hit splats/hp -Active, large, and helpful staff team -Development team is constantly updating and pushing out content -Good voting rewards -Castle wars -Fight caves -God wars -Nex -Nex armors & working Korasi, and new firecape -Curse prayers -100% working claws -Unique Bloodlust system for small teams -Wilderness targets with rewards -Stable and Strong economy -starter packs with everything a new player needs -Pk points system - able to redeem for all the best items. -Custom items (lime whips, death cape, phats, etc) -Ganodermic armour -Pvp armour's -Working spirit shields -New staff event organizer -Kill streaks -EP -Top pker announcements -Lunars -Ancients -Chaotics -Primals -Duel areana -Barrows -Corporeal Beast -Chaos elemental -King Black Dragon
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/c2f3fd8f1956bde79623ef7fd39c959e_zpsd12eee24.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0000_zps507b1593.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0001_zpsd4de9b25.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0002_zpse5ab6f83.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0003_zps96eaff91.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0004_zps400be80f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0005_zps267e25d9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0006_zps6aba76fe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0007_zps07ff0ede.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0008_zpsaf5e9d24.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0009_zps49027bfd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0010_zps3fcfbc51.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0011_zpse3309df5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0012_zps9e52f5a3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0013_zpsb539809f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0015_zpsc20f7314.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0016_zps62ad9c99.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0017_zpsa80a7bd7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o209/i2ye/NVPS0018_zps69129e93.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=4][B]I hope to see you in game![/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.title: [317] Norvation-PS
item.dc:creator: @i2ye2 i2ye2
item.description:
@i2ye2 wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to Norvation-PS. We feature a wide variety of Bossing and PVP like no other server you’ve seen before. Now I know what you’re thinking. “Why should I play this server over other servers?”. The answer is simple. Because we care about every single player, and their opinions. Before we add a new feature, we try our best to get everyone’s feedback before we implement it into the game. Now log in and join the rest of us in the RSPS the community desires!

Forums - http://norvation-ps.com/

[CENTER]Features[/CENTER]
[CENTER]-11X Experience rate for new players
-Able to choose between old and new hit splats/hp
-Active, large, and helpful staff team
-Development team is constantly updating and pushing out content
-Good voting rewards
-Castle wars
-Fight caves
-God wars
-Nex
-Nex armors & working Korasi, and new firecape
-Curse prayers
-100% working claws
-Unique Bloodlust system for small teams
-Wilderness targets with rewards
-Stable and Strong economy
-starter packs with everything a new player needs
-Pk points system - able to redeem for all the best items.
-Custom items (lime whips, death cape, phats, etc)
-Ganodermic armour
-Pvp armour’s
-Working spirit shields
-New staff event organizer
-Kill streaks
-EP
-Top pker announcements
-Lunars
-Ancients
-Chaotics
-Primals
-Duel areana
-Barrows
-Corporeal Beast
-Chaos elemental
-King Black Dragon



















[/CENTER]

[CENTER][SIZE=4][B]I hope to see you in game![/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]
